channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Wall Street looks set to rebound as U.S. stock futures rally after Trump delays E.U. tariff deadline
item.description: Wall Street appears poised to surge when markets open Tuesday, after two days of rallies by U.S. stock futures, spurred by President Donald Trump dela...

item.title: ‘Is this a good tax strategy or a sham transaction?’ My mother wants to give me her home. I have a plan to avoid taxes.
item.description: “If my mother gives her personal residence to me, my understanding is that I also get her adjusted cost basis.”

item.title: My daughter’s boyfriend, a guest in my home, offered to powerwash part of my house — then demanded money
item.description: “The amount was about what I would have paid to get the whole house done, and not just one side.’

item.title: From disruption to reinvention: How knowledge workers can thrive after AI
item.description: We are beginning a cognitive migration: Away from what AI now does well, and toward a redefinition of what humans are now made for.

item.title: Trump’s new tariff threats may shake stocks’ rally as investors brace for a long, hot summer

item.title: ABI Research finds 53% of manufacturers are adopting robots for quality improvement
item.description: Manufacturers are interested in adopting more robots, but they are less aware of the value of advanced AI, according to ABI Research. The post ABI Res...

item.title: My husband used my money to renovate his house. Will I now get half of his property in a divorce?
item.description: “My name is not on the deed to that rental home, but we have been married 15 years.”

item.title: Google’s ‘world-model’ bet: building the AI operating layer before Microsoft captures the UI

item.title: Beyond single-model AI: How architectural design drives reliable multi-agent orchestration
item.description: Successful AI agents require enterprises to orchestrate interactions, manage shared knowledge and plan for failure.

item.title: The battle to AI-enable the web: NLweb and what enterprises need to know
item.description: Microsoft's NLWeb protocol transforms websites into AI-powered apps with conversational interfaces.

item.title: OpenAI updates Operator to o3, making its $200 monthly ChatGPT Pro subscription more enticing
item.description: Operator remains a research preview and is accessible only to ChatGPT Pro users. The Responses API version will continue to use GPT-4o.
